alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; North Itasca; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 1:27AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EAST CENTRAL ITASCA AND WEST CENTRAL ST. LOUIS COUNTIES THROUGH 200 AM CDT... At 127 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Nashwauk, or 9 miles west of Hibbing, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Keewatin around 140 AM CDT. Chisholm around 200 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Leetonia, Kelly Lake and Swan Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; North Itasca; South Itasca
